title: AIATSL Recruitment 2017 – 190 Store Agent, Handyman & Other Posts

organizations.name: air india air transport services ltd.
air india air transport services limited
air india air transport services ltd.

text: 1. Store Agent: 84 Posts 2. Office Agent: 32 Posts 3. Handyman: 63 Posts 4. Utility Agent cum Driver: 07 Posts Age Limit: Candidates upper age should be not above 30 years for General, not above 33 years for OBC & not above 35 years for SC/ ST candidates for Post 1 & 2, not above 28 years for General, not above 31 years for OBC & not above 33 years for SC/ ST candidates for Post 3 & 4 as on 01-02-2017.For more information refer the notification. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Graduation in any discipline/ faculty (minimum 3 years duration) from a recognized University, must have One year experience in Inventory Management/ Stores/ Warehouse in an airline or ground handling agency or warehousing agency or clearing & despatch agency only for Post 1, Graduation in any discipline/ faculty (minimum 3 years duration) from a recognized University, must have One year experience in Office work/ Stores/ Procurement/ Materials in an Airline/ Ground Handling for Post 2, 10th Pass from Recognized Board, minimum one year experience in an airline or ground handling agency or warehousing agency or clearing & despatch agency only for Post 3 & 10th Pass from Recognized Board, Heavy Vehicle Driving Licence at least 1 year old, minimum one year experience of materials handling equipment’s such as Fork Lift, Tractoretcin an airline or ground handling agency or warehousing agency or clearing & despatch agency only for Post 4. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Screening of application/ Group Discussion, Pre-Employment Medical Examination for Post 1 & 2, Screening of application, Pre-Employment Medical Examination for Post 3, Screening of application/ Trade Test, Pre-Employment Medical Examination for Post 4. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.500/- Demand Draft in favour of “Air India Air Transport services Ltd.”, payable at Mumbai. No fee for SC/ ST communities. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in the prescribed format by affixing recent passport size photograph along with self attested copies of all relevant certificates as mentioned in the notification, experience to Air India Air Transport Services Ltd. sign across 1stFloor, Transport Workshop Building, Air India GSD Complex, Sahar, Andhiri (East), Mumbai – 400 099 on or before 14-03-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 14-03-2017. For more details like starting emoluments, work experience, qualification, general conditions & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form AIATSL Recruitment 2017 – Ground Handling Incharge, Terminal Manager & Other Posts: Air India Air Transport Services Limited (AIATSL) has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Ground Handling – Incharge (WR), Terminal Manager – Pax Handling, Terminal Manager – Ramp Handling & Deputy Terminal Manager – Cabin Services vacancies on Fixed Term Contract basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 02-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process and how to apply are given below… AIATSL Vacancy Details:
